_header: Saint Matthias Apostle is as ye shullen all I-wite
Subjects: saints’ lives; Matthias, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Matthias in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Mathi apostel is as ȝe scholleþ iwiteþeru lot
                    apostel ymad he was as we fyndeþ iwrite…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…& burede it þus wiþ gret honur as me sceweþ
                    ȝuteIn seynt marie chirche ofte his heued wit gret prute

Bod779.Transcription:
…And by leued þorwȝ him on god & torned to
                    cristindomeÞe leipr iustise of þe londe þer of I hurd
                    telleHe lot neme þis holyman & in strong deþ a quelleac
                    he nys nowher I founde in boke what deþ he hadde þereas I martrid
                    he was in strong torment as þe apostles wereGode men com þer
                    afterward & þat holy body nome& out of þe lond of Iude
                    ladde hit suþþen to rome& beryid hit þere wit honour
                    þer as me seeþ hym ȝuteIn seint Mary chirch of rome his
                    heued wit gret prite& þus he ended his lyf as ich ȝouh told
                    habbe& in þis maner apostil I chose wit outin eny gabbeNow
                    god for þe loue of him lete vs here so wisseþat whanne we hennes
                    wendeþ come to heuene blisse
Bod779.Note:
Original conclusion to Life of Matthias (final 13 lines) before leaves
                    inserted between ff. 170 and 177 (6853, portion of 787, 5329); therefore repetition of lines now on f. 171,
                    inserted to complete Matthias before the new material.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Mathi Apostel is as ȝe schule alle i witeÞoruȝ
                    lot Apostel i mad he was as we fyndeþ i write…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Nou God for þe loue of seint Mathi lete vs here so
                    wisseÞat we whenne we henne wende come to heuene blisse.
                    Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEint Mathie Apostle is ase ȝe schullen alle i
                    witeþoruȝh Lot he was apostle imaud ase it is i
                    write…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Nov god for þe loue of Seint Mathi us lene ore lif so
                    wisseÞat we ȝwanne we heonnes wiendeth comen to heouene
                    blissa
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 389-90.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Mathi apostel is as ȝe sholl y witeBi lot apostel mad he
                    was as we finde y write…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Now god for þe loue of seint Mathi he vs here so
                    wisseþat we whan we hennes wende Come to heuene blisse
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line

BodTan17.First Lines:
SEint Mathi Apostle as ȝe moun wel witeÞour lot apostle
                    he mad was as we finde write…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…Now god for þe loue of seint Mathi rede vs here so for to
                    wisseÞat whan we henes wende mote comen to heuen blisse

OxfCCC431.First Lines:
[S]eint Mathi þe apostoȝl is as [ȝ]e schollen
                    witeþurȝ loth apostoȝl y mad ȝe was as we findeþ
                    iwrite…
OxfCCC431.Last Lines:
…& burede hir wiþ gret honour [ ]ne may ise
                    ȝuteIn S Marie chirche [ ]f his he[ ]ed comeþ gret
                    prute
OxfCCC431.Note: Portions of text lost due to mutilation of leaves.

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Swint Mathi apostel is as ȝe ssolle iwiteÞoru lot apostel
                    he was ymad as we findeþ iwrite…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Nou god for þe loue of seint mathi lete us here so
                    wisseÞat wanne we hannes wendeþ come to heuene blisse

D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Mathi Apostel is as ȝe mowe wel ywyteÞorw lot
                    apostel he ymad was as we fyndeþ ywrite…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now god ffor þe loue of Seint Mathi let vs so do &
                    wisseÞat whanne we hennes wendeþ we mote come to heuene
                    blisse

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint mathi þe apostel as we fyndeþ ywryteÞorw god
                    apostel he was yamde as we mow ywytte…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…God for loue of seint mathy late ous here so wysseÞat we
                    wan we hanne weneþ come to heuene blysse

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEyn Mathy apostel is as ȝe ssolle y wyteþoru lot apostel
                    ymad he was as we fyndeþ ywrite…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…Nou god for þe loue of sein Mathi let vs here so
                    wisseþat wanne we hanne wendeþ come to heuene blisse
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
De sancto Mathio Apostole (f. 34, by scribe in margin beside first
                    line)

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEin Mathi apostel is as ȝe scholle ywyteþorou lhot apostel ymad he was as we findeþ ywrite…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …& buret hit þere wit gret honour as me schewet ȝuteIn seinte mari cherche ofte his hed with gret prute
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xvii” added to right margin by later hand (f. 30).

Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Cotton_MS_Julius_D_IX.

BLEge1993.First Lines: Seint Mathei þe apostel as ȝe schulleþ witeÞorw lyt apostel he was mad as we findeþ iwrite…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Now god for þe loue of him vs here so wisseÞat we moten wenden into heuene blisse

BLEge2810.First Lines: SEynt mathi apostil is as ȝe schulliþ alle yweteþorþ lot apostil ymakid he was as we fyndiþ ywrete…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Nou god vor þe loue of seynt Mathi let ous here so wisseÞat wanne we hynne wendeþ come to heuene blisse

BLEge2891.First Lines: SEin Matthi apostel is as ȝe solleþ ywiteþoru loth apostel ymad he was as we findeþ iwrite…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …Nou god for þe lous of sein Matthi lete us here so wisseþat wanne we hanne wendeþ come to heuene blisse
BLEge2891.Attributed Title: De sancto Matthio apostolo (rubric in margin, f. 18)

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Mathie apostle as gode clerkes wetenÞurȝ lot he was
                    apostle chosen as holy men han writen…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Now god for þe love of saynt Mathye he vs rede &
                    wisseÞat we may when we hennes wende come to heuen blisse

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seint Mathy apostel was as ȝe shul ywiteÞorgh lotte
                    apostel made he was as we fynde write…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Now god for þe loue of seint Mathie lete vs here so
                    wisseÞat whan we wenden hens we mote come to þat blysse.
                    Amen.
